statements: SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers WHERE account_number = 12345;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, account_number, balance FROM customers ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, balance FROM customers WHERE account_number IN (1001, 1003, 1005) ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, balance FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id ASC, balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE balance < 5000 AND account_number > 2000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, account_number, balance FROM customers ORDER BY account_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE account_balance > 500;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, account_balance FROM Customers WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE account_balance > 10000;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, account_balance FROM Customers WHERE account_balance < 0 OR account_balance > 5000 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, t.amount FROM Customers c JOIN Transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
SELECT c.first_name, t.transaction_type, t.amount FROM Customers c JOIN Transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts;
SELECT type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_id, name, balance FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id;
SELECT type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT accounts.customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM accounts JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id GROUP BY accounts.customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' OR customer_name LIKE 'Z%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT customer_name, account_type, balance FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id

SELECT customer_name, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id
SELECT customer_name, bill_type, amount, due_date FROM customers JOIN bills ON customers.customer_id = bills.customer_id ORDER BY due_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT payment_id, biller, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT payment_id, biller, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount >= 50 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
